REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0614 reute d f BC-SENSORMATIC-<SNSR>-UP 03-09 0050

TEXT.TITLE: SENSORMATIC <SNSR> UPS CHECKROBOT <CKRB> STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Sensormatic Electronics Corp said it upped its investment in CheckRobot Inc in the form of 2.5 mln dlrs of convertible preferred stock, raising its stake in CheckRobot to 42 pct from 37 pct on a fully diluted basis. Reuter
